content: I cannot predict the future with 100% accuracy, however, given the increasing emphasis on sustainability and environmental protection, it is highly likely that the use of green roofs and buildings will become more popular in the future. with the urbanization trend accelerating globally, there is a growing need for sustainable infrastructure that can reduce the impact of human activities on the environment. green roofs and buildings offer a wide range of benefits, including energy efficiency, stormwater management, biodiversity conservation and aesthetic improvement, that are increasingly valued by policymakers, developers, and citizens. as a result, many cities around the world are promoting the use of green roofs and buildings through regulations, incentives, and public awareness campaigns, which will likely encourage their expanded adoption in the future.
